wikipedia_page.main: Marc McCulloch (born 14 March 1980 in Edinburgh), is a Scottish footballer.

response: On 2 August 2018, McIndoe signed for Scottish Junior club Clydebank. He signed a short-term deal as a favour to manager Kieran McAnespie and coach Marc McCulloch, in return gaining match fitness preparing him to go back into the professional game. McIndoe made 9 appearances for the Bankies. On 3 October 2018, McIndoe was released by Clydebank.
